```{r}
original_file <- "original.tex"
modified_file <- "modified.tex"
output_file <- "diff.tex"
```
```{r}
cmd <- paste("latexdiff", original_file, modified_file)
```


```{r}
diff_output <- system(cmd, intern = TRUE)
```
```{r}
writeLines(diff_output, output_file)
```
